arts.ttl: Club Brugge star confident they’re not at disadvantage in Aston Villa tie – Hoping for nice bonus instead
arts.sum: Club Brugge star Joaquin Seys has insisted being drawn at home first in their Champions League tie with Aston Villa will not leave them at a disadvantage. Voetbal Nieuws cover comments from Seys today after the Champions League draw paired Brugge up with Aston Villa on Friday. arts.ttl: Liverpool draw PSG, Arsenal face PSV, Villa meet Club Brugge in last 16
arts.sum: Liverpool will face Paris St-Germain in the Champions League last-16, while Arsenal take on PSV Eindhoven and Aston Villa will play Club Brugge.
